SELECT id , coupon_type , discount_rate , discount_amount , minimum_amount , started_at , finished_at FROM coupon WHERE id = #{couponId}

SELECT id , coupon_type , discount_rate , discount_amount , minimum_amount , started_at , finished_at , icon_url FROM coupon WHERE id IN (SELECT coupon_id FROM member_coupon WHERE member_id = #{memberId})

SELECT C.COUPON_TYPE as "couponType", COUNT(C.ID) as "totalIssued", SUM(CASE WHEN MC.IS_USED = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "totalUsed", (SUM(CASE WHEN MC.IS_USED = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(C.ID)) * 100 as "usageRate" FROM COUPON C LEFT JOIN MEMBER_COUPON MC ON C.ID = MC.COUPON_ID GROUP BY C.COUPON_TYPE
